    • Method Detail

      • modifyLSB

        public byte modifyLSB(byte data,
             boolean toActive)
        Gets a byte as a result to activating/deactivating the lower significant bit of a byte
        Parameters:
        data - a base byte
        toActive - true for active the lower significant bit, false for deactivate the lower significant bit
        Returns:
        the new byte

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive(byte data,
               int bit_position)
        Gets if the specific position of the byte is active
        Parameters:
        data - the byte
        bit_position - position of the bit to be consulting
        Returns:
        true if the bit is active, false otherwise

      • getLSB

        public byte getLSB(byte data)
        Gets new byte with the lower significant bit of byte parameter and other bits are setting to 0
        Parameters:
        data - the byte to be consulting
        Returns:
        new byte with the lower significant bit
